Title: Dedicates a portion of the state highway system to Sgt Henry Johnson
Summary: Dedicates the bridge located on Interstate 90, designated as Bridge Number 1092839, which crosses over the Hudson River in the cities of Albany and Rensselaer to Sgt Henry Johnson.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to dedicating a portion of the state highway system to Sgt Henry Johnson
